column2: Embrace Rusyn Culture
Our brethren in Kiev and Muscovy are adopting foreign customs and speak with ever thicker accents. Perhaps it is time to develop our own distinct culture...
Create Carpathian Rus
Unite your rusyn people and lead them to glory as the rulers of Carpathian region.
Hold Kupala Night
Celebrate the summer solstice and fertility rite with a great festival.
Start religion reform in Rus
Start the religion reform and choose a new strong religion to replace wicked disorganised paganism in your land.
Hold Koliada
Celebrate the winter solstice and end of the year with a great festival.
